summary: This document contains corporate resolutions from Southern Trust Company, Inc. authorizing the establishment and management of accounts with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. It outlines the powers granted to authorized signers and the responsibilities of the bank regarding these accounts.

persons.name: Darren Inks
persons.context: Darren Inks is listed as an authorized signer for the corporate resolutions, allowing him to manage accounts on behalf of Southern Trust Company, Inc.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is also named as an authorized signer for the corporate resolutions, indicating her role in managing the accounts.

persons.name: Tom Siererwe
persons.context: Tom Siererwe is mentioned as an authorized signer, which allows him to execute actions related to the accounts of Southern Trust Company, Inc.

keyFacts: The document certifies corporate resolutions of Southern Trust Company, Inc.
Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas is designated as the depositary and investment adviser.
Authorized signers are granted powers to manage accounts and execute agreements on behalf of the corporation.
The document emphasizes that the bank may rely on the instructions of the authorized signers.
The resolutions are in full force and effect as of the date shown in the document.
